section: V - Organisations representing churches and religious communities
subsection: Organisations representing churches and religious communities
goals__remit: JESC seeks to promote the construction of Europe, and specifically of the European Union, grounded on social justice, peace and freedom. We support the Jesuits of Europe and their collaborators in this mission; and we shall continue to reflect on European values and responsibilities, promoting Europe’s solidarity internally and with the wider world.
